cx-javascript: Wannan kayan aiki baya aiki ba tare da JavaScript ba. An kashe JavaScript, ya kasa aiki, ko kuma wannan abin binciken baya ɗaukar sa.
cx-specialpage-enable-betafeature: [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Content_translation|Fassarar Ƙunshiya]] kayan aiki ne don saurin fassara shafuka cikin yarenku. [$1 Jarraba shi yanzu!]
cx-license-agreement: Domin ci gaba ka yarda da [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use] kuma kun yarda babu makawa ku saki gudummawar ku a ƙarƙashin [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ CC BY-SA 3.0 License] da [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
cx-error-server-connection: Kuskure: An kasa haɗawa zuwa sabar.
cx-publish-error-abuse-filter: Na'urar tace gyaran ku ta gano matsala acikin fassarar ku. Matata takai: $1
cx-publish-error-empty: Server ya maido ba tare da bayanai ba.
cx-publish-error-readonly: Ba a yarda da yin rubutu zuwa wiki ba.
cx-publish-error-spam-blacklist: An gano abun da basu face ba a cikin fassarar ku. Cikakken bayanai: $1
cx-publish-error-title-blacklist: Sunan taken da kuka buga yana cikin jerin baƙi. Da fatan za a zaɓi wani suna don fassarar ku.
cx-publish-error-unknown: Kuskuren da ba a sani ba ya faru. Bayanin kuskure: $1
cx-lost-session-draft: Zaman ku ya ƙare. Ba za a iya adana gyaranku ba sai kun sake shiga cikin wata taga.
cx-lost-session-publish: Zaman ku ya ƙare. Ba za ku iya buga fassarar ba har sai kun sake shiga cikin wata taga.
cx-lost-session-dashboard: Domin yin wannan aikin, da fatan za a sake shiga.
cx-publish-summary: An ƙirƙira ta hanyar fassara shafin "$1"
cx-translation-target-page-exists: Akwai shafin da take [$1 $2] a cikin wiki da aka yi niyya. Yi la'akari da ba shafin wani take daban.
tag-contenttranslation-description: An fassara abun cikin daga wani harshe ta amfani da ƙunshiyar kayan aikin Fassara.
tag-contenttranslation-v2-description: An fassara abun cikin wani harshen ta amfani da siga ta 2 na kayan aikin Fassara.
tag-sectiontranslation-description: An fassara ƙunshiyar daga wani sashen a wani Harshen ta amfani da fitowar fassarar sashe daga Kayan Fassarar ƙunshiya.
cx-beta-desc: Kayan aiki da zai fassara shafuka cikin sauri zuwa harshen ka. Fara fassara daga [[Special:MyContributions|Shafin gudunmawar ka]], tare da gyara su dakayan gyara na gefe da gefe na musamman da akayi su domin fassara. Wasu kayayyakin aikin anyi su na musamman ne domin wasu harsunan.
cx-entrypoint-dialog-page-doesnt-exist-y: Babu wannan shafin a $1 har yanzu. {{GENDER:|kana}} so ta ƙirƙire shi?
cx-entrypoint-dialog-desc: Zaka iya taimakawa Wikipedia ta hanyar fassara wannan shafin. Fassara hanya ce mai sauƙi da zaka ƙirƙiri maƙala zuwa harshen ka.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-title: Ko dai zaka fara da Fassarar?
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-notice: Ƙirƙiri sabuwar maƙala ta hanyar fassarata daga wani harshe da ka sani.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-search: Nemo wani shafin da zaka fassara
cx-special-login-error: Dole ka shiga domin fassara wannan shafin. [$1 Shiga]
cx-tools-instructions-text2: {{GENDER:|Baka}} buƙatar sai ka saka su duka
cx-tools-instructions-text3: {{GENDER:|Yi}} yadda rubutu zai karantu da kyau
cx-tools-instructions-text4: Fassarar Inji mai amfani ce amma {{GENDER:|kana}} buƙatar kayi bitar rubutun domin ƙayatar da shi.
cx-tools-instructions-text6: Idan {{GENDER:|kana}} farin ciki da sakamakon danna "{{int:cx-publish-button}}".
cx-tools-mt-noservices: Babu hidimar fassar waɗannan harsunan. [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Content_translation/Translating/Initial_machine_translation|Me yasa?]]
cx-warning-unsaved-translation: Akwai fassarar da ba'a ajiye ba.
cx-source-page-selector-no-suggestions: Yi tunanin kowacce maudu'i da kake da sha'awa. Baka buƙatar zama ƙwararre kafin yin babbar fassara.
cx-selected-source-page-view-count: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 ziyara a|$1 ziyarce-ziyarce a|0=Ba ziyarce ziyarce wannan}} mako
cx-selected-source-page-error-page-and-t: Anyi amfani da wannan taken a [$1 $2] domin [$3 mabanbancin shafi]
cx-selected-source-page-error-title-in-u: Taken sabon shafin shine [$1 dama akwai shi]
cx-favorite-added-for-later-detail: Ƙara don daga baya! Bincika sharar dubawa ko da yaushe.
cx-favorite-removed: An cire da jerin wanda aka fi so!
cx-mt-abuse-error-title: Fassarar ka {{PLURAL:$1|ta ƙunshi}} adadin $1% na waɗanda basu canzu ba
cx-mt-abuse-error-sections: Wani kashi na fassarar tana ƙunshe da muhimman abinda basu canzu ba
cx-mt-abuse-error-text:
Fassarar otomatik tana samuwa ne kaɗai daga mafari. Tabbatar ƙunshiyar daidai take kuma zata karantu kamar a harshen ka.

Fassarar ka ba zata fassaru ba ba tare da yin cikakken gyara ba.
cx-mt-abuse-warning-title: Ɓangaren fassarar ka {{PLURAL:$1|ya ƙunshi}} $1% wanda bai kammalu ba
cx-mt-abuse-warning-text:
Fassarar otomatik tana samuwa ne kaɗai daga mafari. Tabbatar ƙunshiyar daidai take kuma zata karantu kamar a harshen ka.

Fassarar ka za'a iya goge ta idan mai dubawa ya duba ta.
cx-publish-captcha-title: Bincika ko kai ba saƙaƙo bane
cx-captcha-dialog-error: Amsar ka ba tayi daidai ba. Yi haƙuri, sake gwadawa.
cx-captcha-unsupported-type: Irin captcha ɗin bada yi daidai ba.
cx-suggestionlist-empty-title: Babu wanda ake buƙata zuwa yanzu
cx-suggestionlist-empty-desc: Bamu samu wanda ake buƙata ba. Kana iya dubawa daga baya ko ka nemo shafin da ya danganta ta hanyar yin amfani da kayan shawarar mu (na gwaje-gwaje).
cx-save-draft-save-success: An ajiye {{PLURAL:$1|minti da ya wuce|$1 minti da ya wuce|0=yanzu}}
cx-save-draft-tooltip: Fassara wadda bata kammalu ba tana ajiye kanta da kanta
cx-save-draft-error: Kuskure ya afku yayin ajiye shafi.
cx-contributions-upload-tooltip: Ɗora hotuna, sauti da bidiyo domin amfani da su a shafuka
cx-publishing-dialog-title: A maye gurbin shafin dake akwai?
cx-publishing-dialog-sub-title: Fassarar ka zata maye gurbin shafin da ke akwai. Yi haƙuri, ka tabbatar da maye gurbin.
cx-publishing-with-issues-dialog-message:
Har yanzu dai fassarar ka na da matsalolin da ka iya haɓaka. Yi haƙuri, yi tunanin duba matsalolin kafin wallafawa.

Masu gyaran da zasu duba gudunmawar ka iya nuna gamsuwa da gudunmawar ka.
cx-overwriting-with-issues: Fassarar ka zata maye gurbin shafin da ke akwai da abun ciki da take da matsalolin da ka iya ci haɓaka. Daure ka tabbatar ka bincika matsalolin kafin wallafawa.
cx-translation-already-in-progress-unkno: Wannan ana kan fassara shi daga wani edita da ba'a hafimta ba.
cx-translation-already-in-progress-colla: Yi haƙuri ka tabbatar ka haɗa da {{GENDER:$1|mai amfani}} wanda ya fassara shafin.
cx-draft-discard-confirmation-message: Ka tabbatar kana so a goge wannan fassarar?
cx-beta-feature-enabled-notification: An kunna Fassara ƙunshiya a cikin wannan wiki.
cx-init-critical-error: Kurkuren aibantawa: An kasa loda Fassarar abun ciki saboda kuskuren ciki.
cx-campaign-newarticle-notice: Ƙirƙirar sabon shafi daga fassarawa yanzu tana da sauƙi! Kana so ka sake jarraba babbar Fassarar Abun ciki?
cx-no-target-categories: Babu rukunoni. Yi tunanin ƙasa wanda yafi domin rarraba maudu'i.
cx-no-adapted-categories: Asalin rukunin babu shi a wannan harshen. Binciko ƙarin rukunoni domin samun fitacciyar fayyacewar maudu'i.
cx-stats-try-contenttranslation: Fassara abun ciki kayan aiki ne don ƙirƙirar sabbin shafuka ta hanyar fassara daga wasu harsuna. [$1 Jarraba Fassarar Abun ciki]
cx-tools-missing-link-text: {{GENDER:Maki}} shafin kamar yadda ya ɓace don ƙarfafa ƙirƙirar sa.
echo-pref-tooltip-cx: Sanar da ni game da fassarori na wanda na ƙirƙira ta amfani da Kayan aiki na Fassarar Abun ciki
cx-notification-first-translation: Muna taya murnar fassara ta farko! Duba gudunmawar ka domin samo ƙarin shafukan da za'a fassara.
cx-notification-tenth-translation: Muna taya murnar fassara ta goma! Ka zama ƙwararren mai fassara. Ci gaba da nagartaccen aiki!
cx-notification-hundredth-translation: Kayi fassarori 100! Wannan nasara ce ta musamman. Raba labarin ga sauran editoci.
cx-notification-deleted-draft: Fassarar ka ta $1 saboda an ɗauki sama da shekara ɗaya ba'a gyara ta ba. Fara sabuwar fassara da sabuwar ƙunshiya koda yaushe.
cx-notification-deleted-draft-bundle: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 fassarori}} da yanke su saboda an ɗauki sama da shekara ba'a gyara su ba. Fara su a matsayin sabuwar fassara da sabuwar ƙunshiya koda yaushe.
cx-notification-continue-translation: Ka fara fassara $1 watanni da suka wuce. Shawara shine ka wallafa su kafin su goge kansu bayan shekara.
cx-notification-continue-translation-bun: Ka fara {{PLURAL:$1|$1 fassara}} watanni da suka wuce. Shawara shine ka wallafa su kafin su goge kansu bayan shekara.
cx-translationlist-empty-desc: {{GENDER:|Fara}} Fassarar ka yanzu kuma ka ci gaba ko da yaushe.
cx-draft-restore-failed: An gaza cimma loda Ajiyayyar fassara!
cx-notification-suggestions-available: Ya dogara ga fassarar {{GENDER:$2|ka}} ta baya ta '''$1''', sababbin waɗanda ake buƙata yanzu sun samu.
cx-infobar-cannot-publish: Fassarar ka ba zata wallafu ba saboda an samar da wallafawar ne kaɗai ga jajirtattun editoci a kan wannan wiki ɗin.
cx-infobar-old-version: Wannan Fassarar ta ta'allaƙa ne a kan tsohon samfur na ƙunshiya. Asalin shafin zai sauya kana buƙatar ka sake loda fassarar.
cx-tools-linter-mark-as-resolved: Saka shi a matsayin wanda aka gyara
cx-tools-linter-abuse-filter: Macirar gurɓatattun abubuwa ta bayyana akwai matsala a fassarar ƙunshiyar ka
cx-tools-linter-empty-title-message: Dukkan Shafuka na buƙatar sunaye domin masu amfani su samu damar nemo su. Daure, ka bayar da suna ga fassarar ka domin wallafawa.
cx-tools-linter-invalid-character: Taken Fassarar ka na ƙunshi da ƙunshiya mara kyau
cx-tools-linter-invalid-character-messag:
Wasu Tsarin haruffan ba zasu yi amfani ba a taken shafukan.

Daure, ka gyara taken domin ƙauracewa matsalar tsarin haruffan.
cx-tools-linter-page-exists-message:
Shafi mai taken $1 akwai shi. Wallafa fassarar ka zai maye gurbin shafin da ke akwai.

Duba ko ya dace ka maye gurbin da ke akwai ɗin, ko kuma ka sake sunan fassarar ka.
cx-tools-linter-cannot-publish-title: Ƙwararrun masu amfani ne kaɗai ke da ikon wallafawa
cx-tools-linter-cannot-publish-message:
Wannan al'ummar ta yanke shawarar ta taƙaita yawan wallafe-wallafe sai dai gaƙwararrun editoci kaɗai. Ba zaka iya wallafa wannan fassarar ba har sai ka samu ƙarin fahimta na gyara a wannan wiki ɗin, amma zaka iya:
  • Wallafa Fassarar ka a matsayin wanda bai kammalu ba, tare da yin amfani da kayan gyara na yau da kullum domin ƙirƙirar maƙala.
  • Fassara wannan maƙalar zuwa wani harshen ba tare da wannan iyakar ba.
cx-tools-linter-cannot-publish-action-la: Saita domin wallafawa a matsayin wanda bai kammalu ba
cx-tools-linter-template-block-message:
Asalin shafin ke amfani da Template ɗin wanda babu shi a wannan wiki ɗin.

An wuce wanda template ɗin, amma zaka iya amfani da sabon ƙunshi domin ɗaukar bayanan da aka rasa.
cx-tools-linter-template-inline-message:
Asalin shafin ne ake amfani da wannan Template ɗin domin tsara abun ciki, amma wasu daga cikin waɗannan basu a wannan wiki ɗin.

Abun cikin Template ɗin da aka rasa an saka ta a fankon shafi. Tabbatar ka duba sakamakon.
cx-tools-linter-empty-template:
Bayanan asalin template ɗin ba zata koma zuwa template ɗin da ke kan fassara ba tunda dai akwai bambanci a tsarin su.

Daure, ka gyara template ɗin a fassara domin cike bayanan da aka rasa.
cx-tools-linter-template-missing-mandato:
An ƙara template ɗin ba tare da wasu bayanai ba.
Bayanan d aka rasa ba zasu samu ba kai tsaye daga asalin template ɗin tun daga tsarin su yana da banbanci na daban.

Daure, ka gyara template a fassarar domin ka cike bayanan da aka rasa.
cx-tools-linter-old-revision: Fassara ta ta'allaƙa ne ga tsohon samfurin na shafin
cx-tools-linter-old-revision-message:
Wannan fassarar ta dogara ne akan tsohuwar sigar samfur. Shafin tushe na iya samun [$1 ya canza sosai]. 

Kuna iya ci gaba da wannan fassarar, ko sake fara ta don amfani da abun ciki da aka sabunta.  Idan kun sake kunna fassarar, canje -canjenku na yanzu za su ɓace.
cx-tools-linter-reference-message:
Ba za a iya canja wurin magana zuwa fassarar ba tunda tana amfani da samfuri tare da tsari daban.

Da fatan za a gyara bayanin a cikin fassarar don cike bayanin da ya ɓace.
cx-tools-linter-incomplete-reference-mes:
An ƙara manazarta ba tare da wasu bayanan da ake buƙata ba.  

Ba za a iya samun cikakkun bayanan da suka ɓace ta atomatik daga asalin abin ba tunda tsarin su ya ɗan bambanta.  

Da fatan za a gyara bayanin a cikin fassarar don cike bayanin da ya ɓace.
cx-tools-linter-restart-translation-mess: Zaka iya sake fassara ta samfurin baya bayan nan. Dukkan abubuwan da ka sauya zasu ɓace.
cx-publish-destination-tooltip: Zaɓi sunan da za'a wallafa shafin
cx-publish-destination-namespace-main-de: A filin sunan da kowa zai iya karantawa
cx-publish-destination-namespace-user-de: Ƙasan filin sunan ka da zaka inganta
cx-publish-destination-namespace-draft-d: A cikin filin sunan da bai kammalu ba domin al'umma su duba sannan kuma su bunƙasa shi
cx-publish-destination-namespace-changed: An sauya wajen wallafawa zuwa wanda bai kammalu ba na musamman. Yi ƙare-ƙare ga saituttukan wallafawa ko da yaushe
cx-mt-abuse-publish-error: Fassarar ka ba zata wallafu ba saboda akwai gyare-gyaren da ba'ayi ba da yawa.
cx-auto-failed: Ba'ayi nasarar fassarar kai tsaye ba
cx-mt-failed: Ba'a sami nasarar fassarar inji ba
cx-unreviewed-translation-category: Shafuka masu fassarorin da ba'a duba ba
cx-unreviewed-translation-category-desc: Fassararrun Shafuka da kayan aikin Fassarar Ƙunshiya ya da suke ɗauke da rubutun da ba'a duba ba
cx-preference-enable-entrypoints: Samun damar [[$1|fara fassara]], daga shafin gudunmawa, jerin shafuka, da sababbin ƙirƙirarrun shafuka.
cx-feature-discovery-content: Zaka iya fara ko cigaba da fassara ko da yaushe daga {{int:mycontris}} shafi
cx-sx-section-selector-desc: Zaka haɗa ƙunshiya a dukkan harsunan
cx-sx-existing-translation-additional-in: Faɗaɗa da $1{{PLURAL:$2| da $2 ƙarin sashe| da $2 ƙarin sassa|0=}}
cx-sx-section-selector-empty-missing-sec: Jarraba da wani shafin ko a mabanbantan harsuna
cx-sx-section-selector-automatic-section: Sashe na kai tsaye ya dace
An gane sassan kai tsaye kuma ko da yaushe sakamakon baya yin daidai
cx-sx-section-selector-unsupported-secti: Sassan da ba zasu yi ba
Wasu sassan ba zasu fito a jerin ba saboda ƙunshiyar su ba zata yi ba har yanzu.
cx-sx-content-comparator-review-contents: Ta yiwu akwai ƙunshiya daga sashen da aka rufe ta da maƙalar da aka nufata.
sx-quick-tutorial-secondary-point-step-1: Fassa ka wallafa sashe ɗaya a lokaci guda. Mai sauƙin ne, sauri, da nishaɗi!
sx-quick-tutorial-secondary-point-step-2: Fassarorin da ake buƙata na buƙatar dubawar ka domin karanta su yadda ya kamata.
cx-sx-content-comparator-mapped-section-: Fassarar ka zata bunƙasa sashen da ke akwai. Yanke wannan idan sashen basu dace ba.
cx-sx-translation-confirmer-views-count: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 ziyara a|$1 ziyarce ziyar ce a|0=Ba ziyarce ziyarce wannan}} mako
cx-sx-content-comparator-discarded-secti: Za'a wallafa fassarar ka a matsayin sabon shafi mai cin gashin kan sa.
cx-sx-sentence-selector-translation-opti: Zabi zabubbukan fassara domin jumlar da zata biyo baya.
cx-sx-content-comparator-present-section: Za'a saka fassarar ka a nan
Yayin wallafawa zaka yanke shawarar ko zaka maye gurbin kunshiyar da ke akwai.
cx-sx-content-comparator-missing-section: Za'a saka sabon sashe a nan idan fassarar ka ta kammalu
cx-sx-publisher-publish-panel-new-sectio: Za'a saka fassarar ka a makala a matsayin sabon sashe.
cx-sx-publisher-review-info: Bincika cewa lallai fassarar ka zata karantu da ingancin rubut
cx-sx-publisher-animation-publishing-ind: Mun gode da wallafa ƙungiya a harshen ka
cx-sx-publisher-sandbox-option-details: Wallafa a filin ka na musamman domin ka duba kuma ka kwafa a ko ina.
cx-sx-publisher-publish-panel-sandbox-se: Fassarar ka zata zama a shafin ka na gwaji.
cx-sx-publisher-review-info-error: Ba za'a wallafa fassarar ka ba:
cx-dashboard-experimental-support-banner: Ta yaya zaka fadada makalar da ke akwai ta hanyar fassara sabon sashe. Ko ta yay, wasu fitowar adaga babban shafi ba zasu samu ba har yanzu.
cx-sx-published-section-confirmation-con: An wallafa fassarar ka. Kaddara ka kara gyara abun ciki, ko ka kara wani sashen.
cx-sx-published-section-invitation-missi: "$1" {{PLURAL:$2|da $2 karin wanda aka rasa|0=is wanda aka rasa}}
cx-sx-publisher-mt-abuse-message-title: Fassarar ka ta kunshi $1% rubutun da bai kammalu ba
cx-sx-publisher-mt-abuse-message-body: Fassarar inji zata fara ne daga wajen farawa kadai. Zaka iya wallafawa, amma ka tabbata fassarar ka zata zarantu da kyau a harshen ka.
cx-sx-article-search-no-suggestions-mess: Yi tunanin ko wanne maudu'in da kake sha'awa. Ba sai ka zama kwararren edita ba kafin ka fara kirkirar babbar fassara.
cx-sx-translation-confirmer-action-messa: Fadada da $1 ko ka bincika sassan da ke akwai
Babu sashen da aka rasa. Duba wadanda suke.
Babu sassan da za'a fassara. Fara sabuwar fassara domin maye gurbin shafin da ke akwai.
cx-campaign-mflanguagesearcher-invite: Zaka iya fassara wannan shafin. Hanya ce mai sauki da zaka fassara zuwa harshen ka.
